data.persona: I am a soldier for the king.  He sends us to take land and battle other kingdoms.  I will always defend my kingdom.
data.description:
You are in the The room at the top of the tower.
Small and round, the room is accessed by a spiral staircase. The room has stone walls, wooden floors and a decoratively carved wooden rocking chair next to a which looks over the castle's moat and the meadows and woodlands beyond.
There's a wooden floors, a spiral staircase, a moat, a window, a wall, a woodland, and a meadow here.
The servant is here.

You are carrying nothing, wearing an armor and a tunic, and wielding a sword.

data.short_motivation: I need to remove my armor so that I can sit comfortably.
data.mid_motivation: I have been ordered to be on watch duty from the top of the tower.
data.long_motivation: I will remain vigilant and continue to protect the kingdom especially with the whispers of war coming from the Southern Kingdom.

timeline.label: 30 minutes ago
timeline.action: go The room at the top of the tower
